abilities.title: Shapechanging Mastery
abilities.description: Changelings can alter their shape and size to mimic any humanoid (3-10 ft/0.9-3 m), growing hair/fur but not extra limbs or objects. Transformation takes one melee (15 seconds). Weight varies ±30 lbs; impersonation may require diet adjustment. Attributes remain constant, clothes don’t change, asexual nature allows male/female/both forms.

abilities.title: Mental Resilience
abilities.description: Changelings have superior mental endurance and affinity, granting +2 to save vs telepathic probes and mind control.

abilities.title: O.C.C. Bonuses
abilities.description: +2 to save vs telepathic probes, mind control, and horror factor, +5% to disguise skill.
